turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey John, i need you to order a few pizzas for our meeting today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok do you know where you want it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Use Grimaldi's downtown. They have our account information so just tell them where you're from.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's order three large pizzas. One of them will be meatballs and pepperoni. The second, i want canadian bacon and pineapple. For the last one, can you see what their veggie option is?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, i will ask them when i call. Are you ok with me ordering whatever they have for the veggie option?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine, just no onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. What time do you want the pizzas delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The meeting is at 1, so let's do 12:45.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. do you want me to add anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go ahead and add some appetizers. Just see what their best sellers are and add enough for 10 people.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok sounds good. I'll make the call right now. Let me know if you want to add anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, John.Let me know when you get everything confirmed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just finished calling them. They are out of pineapple because they had a problem with their supplier this week.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: uh oh.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to keep the canadian bacon or change the pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do canadian bacon and green peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. everything else was fine in the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds great. See if they can throw in a dessert.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am. I called in the order and it will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.
